thread.section_title: Chewy.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Chewy.com | chewy.com
thread.title: Holly Prieto Cotter
thread.title_full: Chewy.com reviewed by Holly Prieto Cotter

author: Holly Prieto Cotter
title: Holly Prieto Cotter
text: Chewy has better prices than even the Big W, and they carry all the same items you'll find in a big box pet store, as well as some of the hard to find premium pet foods. I've been purchasing all my pet supplies from them for about 2 years now, and I am always amazed by their product selection, incredibly low prices, and top notch customer support. And it's so much more convenient having everything shipped to your door (for free) instead of lugging all those heavy items home from a store. I recommend Chewy to everyone... I'll never buy my pet supplies anywhere else!
